DataElement.preferredName: Central Venous Access Catheter Consent Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator that asks whether there was consent to receive central venous catheter for eligibility criteria.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Central Venous Access Catheter Consent Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A venous catheter positioned with the tip in the proximal third of the superior vena cava, the right atrium, or the inferior vena cava._Permission to do something._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.
